title: Sigarlaki and Limbat
text: Sigarlaki and Limbat is a <a href="folklore">folklore</a> originating from <a href="North%20Sulawesi">North Sulawesi</a>. Sigarlaki is a <a href="hunter">hunter</a>, Limbat is his servant. They reside in a village known as <a href="Tondano">Tondano</a>. This folklore tells a story about the friendship between Sigarlaki and Limbat. It also provides loyalty as a core value.
